title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Thaddeus Kosciusko found many ways to pass the time while recovering from his wounds, like playing chess, drawing in his sketch book, and visiting with friends. NPS photo   Â    Photos   Looking for photos of the Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial? Check out our photo gallery. The National Park Service Digital Image Archive is another great source for photos and videos of all our national parks.
